Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Exempts political subdivisions from the imposition of the metropolitan commuter transportation mobility tax
Summary: Exempts political subdivisions from the imposition of the metropolitan commuter transportation mobility tax.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the exemption of political subdivisions from the imposition of the metropolitan commuter transportation mobility tax
